product.title: Paradise Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
product.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.

relproducts.title: Rimini Azure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

relproducts.title: Rimini Turquoise - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

relproducts.title: Rimini Powder Blue - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Sapphire Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm sapphire blue is a beautiful colour, and works erfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm sapphire blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dark teal blue is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dark teal blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This rich midnight blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This light brittany blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This light blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Valencia Cobalt Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The versatility of the blue fabric is stunning. The dark blue tones can be paired with steel & wooden finishes for a modern twist or as a perfect complement to whites and further shades of blue in more traditional interiors.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dramatic dark teal blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Kerry Paradise Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Combining the colour of unblemished sapphires and the soft resilience of its polyester fabric, this blind is undeniably the greatest thing ever invented by man. No joke. Being such a rich colour with so much personality, that this blind will make your home better in every regard is a given. The only danger to ordering this blind is that houseguests may or may not try to steal it, but if they are willing to endanger your friendship for a window blind, then they arent worth it honey.

relproducts.title: Paradise Flamingo Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Wow, these punchy tones are really as vibrant as they look. Vivid pink, green, yellow, purple and blue, plus a touch of orange too. Together they look wild and exotic. And this theme is carried through the jungle pattern too, where layers of foliage and fauna fight to show of wow, these punchy tones are really as vibrant as they look.

relproducts.title: Paradise Raspberry Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Step through the gardens of paradise with this aptly named paradise raspberry roller blind. Its home to an array of exotic species, as well as a stunning palette of colours. The grey background of this design helps to ground the rainbow of shades, offering a soft balance to step through the gardens of paradise with this aptly named paradise raspberry roller blind.

relproducts.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day And Night Blind
relproducts.description: Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the capri vision paradise green day and night roller blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.

relproducts.title: Paradise Willow Green Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This cream roman blind has a bold leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. Product id: db-arom0839 fabric colour: willow green material: 82% polyester 18% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes paradise willow green roman blind in cream/blue/green/multicoloured.

relproducts.title: Paradise Auburn - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes. Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully.

relproducts.title: Paradise Flamingo Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Well, nothing comes quite as close to the paradise flamingo roman blind on the liveliness scale, does it? This window dressing is simply exotic. Theres an abundance of tones in this design, making the window dressing fantastically versatile fresh, funky and forever feeling snazzy, this paradise lagoon roman blind is everything that the harlequin brand stands for.

Plus, admire the sunlight as it softly drifts thro add a lovely wash of colour to your home with the lumiere misty blue roman blind, a window dressing full of modern chic.

relproducts.title: Velvet Royal Blue Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in royal blue, introduces a deep dark blue to your home.

relproducts.title: Paradise Fennel - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Featuring fennel green tones, alongside yellows and whites, this pretty offering from the paradise range is aptly named. The lush foliage and florals depicted are reminiscent of a country paradise, making this a work of art in its own right. Create a serene utopia for your guests to rest up in by using the fennel in your spare bedroom. Surround with similar greens, accenting occasionally with yellows and whites, and keep the general look and feel of the room tranquil and relaxing.
